title: Elvis Presley - Hot August night (2013)
description:
Title:  Hot August Night - The Complete Midnight Show, August 25, 1969 
Label:  Follow That Dream (FTD) 
Catalog number:   506020-975062, Follow That Dreams Records / Sony Music 
Matrix:   
IFPI L553   d:centia506020-975062  A0102128004-0101 13  A00    IFPI 946Q
 
Release date:  07/2013 
Playing time:  75:07 
   
Recording type:  Live Soundboard Recording 
Location::  Las Vegas, Hilton Hotel 
Date:   
August 25 - 1969, Midnight Show 
 
      
Track listing:   
01 Opening /Blue Suede Shoes       02:25 
02 I Got A Woman       02:42 
03 All Shook Up       01:54 
04 Elvis welcomes the audience       01:13 
05 Love Me Tender       02:27 
06 Jailhouse Rock / Don't Be Cruel       03:05 
07 Heartbreak Hotel       02:21 
08 Hound Dog       04:48 
09 I Can't Stop Loving You       02:36 
10 My Babe       02:28 
11 Mystery Train / Tiger Man       04:23 
12 Monologue: Life Story       08:00 
13 Baby What You Want Me To Do       02:00 
14 Runaway       02:19 
15 Are You Lonesome Tonight       03:03 
16 Words       02:41 
17 Yesterday / Hey Jude       05:57 
18 Introductions       04:39

Notes:   This is a special collector edition housed in a 7" (17,5 cm) triple-fold-out cover. Includes a 12-pages booklet with photos. 
 
 
Concert:   All shows from 1969 stand out as a class of their own and this one is no exception. 
 Another vibrant concert from Elvis' sensational stage comeback ! Mr. Rock 'n' Roll showed the world that he was still "The King" ! We have an excellent set list with no weak spot. The crowd surely had just one happy hour they would never forget. Elvis` long-time friend Tom Jones was in the audience, too. Perhaps this fact encouraged Elvis even more. Fantastic ! (Ciscoking).
